column5: Curious if there are any large tackle stores around the Lake. South East end in particular. Gander Mountain style.......or something that has a large selection of, oops i forgot it, or oops i broke it type gear lol.
Hey Blaque, all you need is a jig and a worm!

North Bay has Can. Tire/ w-mart etc. Lefebvres used to have tackle, but I was there last summer and it looked like they had gone more towards outdoor gear and clothing.  As for Calender and the smaller places around the south east area of the lake you can find the typical gas/bait/groceries stores. Not the best selection but it dosn't make business sense to carry walls and walls of stock.  I try to cover all isuses before leaving and either make due or head into North Bay if I can't.   Rob
Thanks guys. Very encouraging news Nippi!!

Nippissing has it RIGHT!  I have been going to Callendar for a few years for the May 24 weekend and last year I decided to be a hotshot and try something else.  Out fish everyone with my new secret.  Well, everyone did well, me, SKUNK.  Jig and a worm, that's it!!  Sherriff
